known_issues: Deployed app page is not loading (deployment URL may be unreachable or deployment incomplete); user requested redeploy.

existing_features.title: Redeploy the current application build to the Internet Computer and provide a fresh, user-accessible deployment URL that loads the app successfully in a browser.
Add a visible non-blank initial loading fallback so that if the React bundle fails to load or takes time to initialize, the user sees an on-page message instead of an empty screen.

projectName: Redeploy the app and prevent blank-page load failures
